name: Vek Snek
description:
Welcome to the Great Plane, home of the vector sneks! Vector sneks are evolutionary descendants of orthographic sneks, an ancient breed which could only move in four cardinal directions. Unlike their ancestors, vector sneks can move freely upon the Plane. A vector snek cares about only three things: moving, eating, and growing.

Steer your snek toward the food. Try not to let the snek boop its own body (which can injure its delicate snoot) or fall off the edge of the Plane.
